cscie55.hw1.elevator

Class Elevator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie55.hw1.elevator.Elevator

  • public class Elevator
extends java.lang.Object
    This initial version of the Elevator class will keep track of the number of passengers on each floor destined for each floor, and whether a stop on that floor is required. Any number of passengers may board the elevator.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Derm Duncan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int GROUND_FLOOR
      The elevators ground floor
      static int NUM_OF_FLOORS
      The number of floors the elevator goes up

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Elevator()
      Constructor to set up the Elevators state

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void boardPassenger(int floor)
      Method to add a passenger to the elevator and specify the floor they're going to
      void move()
      Method which modifies the elevators state, moving it floor by floor in a certain direction and clears the number of passengers destined for a floor when a floor is reached.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Override the toString method to show the total number of passengers in the elevator and the current floor the elevator is on

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public final void move()
        Method which modifies the elevators state, moving it floor by floor in a certain direction and clears the number of passengers destined for a floor when a floor is reached. If it hits the ground or top floor it switches direction.

      • boardPassenger

        public final void boardPassenger(int floor)
        Method to add a passenger to the elevator and specify the floor they're going to
        Parameters:
        floor - The floor the passenger is going to

      • toString

        public final java.lang.String toString()
        Override the toString method to show the total number of passengers in the elevator and the current floor the elevator is on
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
